name: Survive The Story Early Alpha
description:
Survive The Story is a single player survival game.

The player is part of a security team, which provides security in underground bunkers after the people live in underground bunkers. SurviveTheStory is a first person shooter. You can, loot, explore, fight, eat drink, craft and much more.

The game will later be playable in co-op or alone.

This is a small development version. Where the first few minutes are playable. Much can and will still change.

Much is not ready yet. I want to give you a first impression of the game.

There are a lot of Bugs. I am working on them. 

I appreciate any kind of feedback.

 Thanks for your time.

Have a great one. :)
